titleStmt.title: Act discharging the vending of any goods brought from England, till they abide their fourty dayes tryal. Edinburgh, the second day of March, one thousand six hundred and sixty six.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
